duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide food, wine, and beer service to Members and guests with a focus on excellence, consistency, and the Member/guest experience.
Engage with Members & assist in wine and beverage selection.
Execute excellent wine service and manage corkage wines brought into the restaurant.
Oversee the management of wine inventory within the outlet and maintain a clean and organized cellar.
Ensure compliance to health, safety, and hygiene standards and records.

education_certification.credential: Court of Master Sommeliers, WSET, or similar certification programs are encouraged, but not required.
